title: Drawing, "Harold S. Anderson House: Furniture", ca. 1937
description: Two floor plans for room in Harold S. Anderson house, Bel Air, CA. Room irregular in size, with rounded, semi-circular portion on left side, rectangular in size on right side. In floor plan at left, curved sofa conforming to shape of the semi-circular room, with round coffee table in front of sofa. Floor plan at right showing another plan for the same room. Curved sofa in semi-circular niche covering half of the wall, with chair and coffee table below. At center of room is curved sofa in L-shape, with coffee table and chair in upper right. Various other furniture sketched throughout.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Harold S. Anderson House: Furniture", ca. 1937.
ca. 1937. Graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-304-5.
